description: I am a born optimist who always looks for the light at the end of the tunnel. Negative people I can't stand well. I am self-employed and work as a winemaking expert and teacher. I teach in Schiedam, Roeselare and Hasselt, and have clients throughout the Benelux. So I am on the road a lot. My work is my passion. So I work a lot. I teach four evenings and almost all Saturdays. So I'm not at home a lot. I get so much gratitude and friendship from my students and clients that I hardly feel like I'm working. Sometimes I think I am just compensating for the lack of attention and love in this way. And I feel more and more the need for a "buddy". Someone where I get not only respect and appreciation, like at home, but warmth, affection, affection and maybe more. I am not open to it, I need it. I have come to that realization by now. So .....................
